Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-2588 affecting package augeas for versions less than 1.12.0-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-2588 affecting package augeas for versions less than 1.12.0-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package augeas is earlier than 1.12.0-6, affected by CVE-2025-2588
